Detailed Description

This class describes curve in 2D with two vectors of coordinates (X and Y coordinates). These vectors are presented with iX_begin, iX_end, iY_begin and iY_end pointers. Curve is a segmented curve, not a smooth line.

See also:
surfit_curv
